description:
Sporty, functional and modern - the Vion is pleasantly light to wear. Whether it's a picnic by the lake or light hikes on paved mountain trails, whether on the way to work or to distant holiday destinations - the shoe made of high-quality Perwanger suede impresses both visually and functionally. The sole with a deep hexagon profile provides excellent cushioning and offers plenty of grip. The sole is also characterized by 10% recycled rubber.

*** All Hanwag boots are sold under UK sizing - Please see size chart for details/conversion.
name: HanWag Vion - Mens
